description: A short-sleeved cotton shirt, slightly thicker than a t-shirt.

variants.description: A short-sleeved cotton shirt, slightly thicker than a t-shirt.

This is a short-sleeved cotton shirt, slightly thicker than a t-shirt.  On the left side of the upper torso there is a logo of a large Supermarket chain, indicating that either the wearer or the original owner of this polo shirt worked there as an employee.

A dark blue t-shirt with a circle of stars.  Inside the circle is a blue and yellow skeleton with his arms raised and mouth open.  Above the skeleton are the words 'Make Eternia' and below him, 'Great Again'.
A light gray t-shirt with a drawing of a Nazgûl riding a black horse.  The drawing is in the style of old My Little Pony cartoons.
A short-sleeved cotton shirt.
A t-shirt printed with a design of Matt Berry in a rugby shirt, a fist raised to the sky, mouth agape, shouting 'Faaather'!
A black shirt with a green robot poorly disguised as a dog.  Words printed on it read: "It's time for the DOOM song.  Doom, doom, doom, dooooom!!"
A black shirt displaying a dog wearing the uniform of a well known galactic bounty hunter.  In place of a wrist rocket, it fires a tennis ball on a string.

The front of this shirt displays a blue portal with a mouse's head sticking out.  The mouse is pointing some kind of gun-like device towards a cube made of Swiss cheese.  The back of the shirt has an orange portal, with the back half of the mouse entering the portal.
This shirt displays a drawing of a ceiling with a round hole in it.  A quizzical-looking Cthulhu pokes its head down through the hole.
This shirt displays a picture of a jack-o'-lantern with a tiny smiling black bat popping out of the top.

name.str: portal to the cat dimension t-shirt

variants.description: A black t-shirt with a picture of a woman standing in front of a yawning portal, with numerous cats exiting the portal and surrounding her.
This shirt displays a picture of a giant blocky robot with a cone-shaped head.  It holds both arms out, carrying a cyclops woman with purple hair.
A t-shirt with a picture of a peasant with a fist raised, eyes alight with the fire of freedom, proclaiming, 'Down with sword-based governments!'
A black t-shirt with a picture of an old-fashioned cartoon black goat on the front, above the goat it says 'Black Phillip' and below are the words 'Live Deliciously'.
A black t-shirt with a picture of a stylized castle with five spires.  Each spire has a purple-gray flame at the top.  At the bottom of the castle it says 'Menzoberranzan'

This t-shirt displays a picture of a hooded child standing behind a lectern, his mouth open and his arms held high.  A pentagram has been carved into the lectern and stuffed animals are arranged in a semicircle facing the child.  On the left of the child are the words 'Let's Start A Cult', while below it reads 'Activities for Children'.
This white cotton t-shirt displays a cartoonish image of a traditional cheeseburger on a plate, and on top of it, a text that reads 'I LOVE CHEESEBURGERS!'.
A comfortable black t-shirt with the logo of a popular video-sharing platform that looks like a large red play button emblazoned on the front.

A comfortable purple t-shirt staring a white speech bubble outlined in black, resembling a chat bubble, at the front.  Inside the bubble, there are two small, stylized commas arranged vertically, resembling eyes, these are black with white highlights.
A short-sleeved cotton shirt with the logo of a local baseball team printed on its front and back.
A short-sleeved cotton shirt with the logo of a local football team printed on its front and back.
